h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: Completing an NPC's questline in Chapter 5 of Black Myth: Wukong will unveil a secret area and hidden bosses. The Five Element Carts guard passages throughout the Flaming Mountains, but you'll need to beat four of them if you want to enter Bishui Cave. Here's everything you need to know to complete this questline, including a detailed walkthrough below.

The content is as follows:
Completing an NPC's questline in Chapter 5 of Black Myth: Wukong will unveil a secret area and hidden bosses. The Five Element Carts guard passages throughout the Flaming Mountains, but you'll need to beat four of them if you want to enter Bishui Cave. Here's everything you need to know to complete this questline, including a detailed walkthrough below.
